1.content: This will be a choose your mistress type story, with different options and endings relevant to the chosen character.
1.title: Please choose your desired Mistress.

11.content: You will be playing as 'Beast Boy', a fellow companion to Raven and potential love interest. Beast Boy has always been a little too forward with his feelings towards Raven, and she has always tried to stay reserved believing that her strange kinks would make their potential relationship impossible. It will be up for you to decide if you refuse her inclinations, or accept them. Either way, there will be farts.
11.title: 'Raven' - From the show Teen Titans.

12.content: You will be playing as 'Sasuke', fellow squad member to Sakura and her biggest crush. Sasuke has always ignored Sakura, seeing her as an annoying girl who would fawn over him at any given opportunity. Fed up with being given the cold shoulder, Sakura decides to punish the one she loves with a most devious genjutsu.
12.title: 'Sakura' - From the show Naruto.

13.content: You will be playing as 'Prince Zuko', heir to the throne and brother to Azula. Zuko has always been the victim of his sisters teasing and bullying, never being able to really defend himself from Azula's sadistic and tormenting personality. One night, Azula pushes the teasing and bullying to the next level.
13.title: 'Azula' - From the show Avatar.

info.brief_description: An interactive story involving femdom content, with a focus on farts.
info.description:
This will be a written erotica with a focus on fart fetish content. Most characters will be taken from shows, movies, or games that I am familiar with. If you would like to request a character, feel free to let me know. I will keep this story literate, punctual, and use proper grammar throughout. If you would like to add you own chapter, feel free to submit one. I will be strict in accepting them, and may modify the entry based on the content. Fetishes in this interactive story will include.
-Farting
-Kissing
-Oral Sex
-Facesitting
-Humiliation
-Threesomes
-Others
Please keep this either female on male, or female on female. These stories are about femdom. Enjoy responsibly.
